title: How to Shoot Paper Bullets from a Rubber Band (Hornets)

steps.title: Cut a long strip of paper from an A4 sheet lengthways, it should be 2 inches wide.
steps.content: Cut a long strip of paper from an A4 sheet lengthways, it should be 2 inches wide.

steps.title: Hold it vertically and then fold up in tiny sections of about a centimeter each time.
steps.content: Hold it vertically and then fold up in tiny sections of about a centimeter each time.

steps.title: Keep folding up until you're at the top.
steps.content: Keep folding up until you're at the top.

steps.title: At the top it should look like a 2 inch long, 1cm thick chunky piece of paper, then fold that in half lengthways.
steps.content: At the top it should look like a 2 inch long, 1cm thick chunky piece of paper, then fold that in half lengthways.

steps.title: Take the rubber band and place on thumb and index finger.
steps.content: Take the rubber band and place on thumb and index finger.

steps.title: Place your "bullet" or paper hornet on the rubber band so it looks like this.
steps.content: Place your "bullet" or paper hornet on the rubber band so it looks like this.
